content.question: The National Road was constructed primarily for the purpose of

choices.label: demarcating the southwestern boundary of the Louisiana Purchase
promoting trade and communication with the Old Northwest
assisting the movement of settlers to the Oregon Country
relieving overpopulation and crowding in the Northeast

content.answer: promoting trade and communication with the Old Northwest

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
